alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone; Roosevelt; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 19 at 10:56PM MST until February 20 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Garfield County in northeastern Montana... Southwestern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Southern Valley County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern McCone County in northeastern Montana... * Until midnight MST. * At 1055 PM MST, intense rainshowers with damaging winds were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Lustre to 22 miles southwest of Tampico, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Nashua, Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Fort Peck Marina, Frazer, Duck Creek Rec Area, Oswego, Haxby, Park Grove and Whatley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
